description: Vanakkam I have great pleasure to be amidst all of you at Coimbatore,the textile capital of South India and the commercial hub of Tamil Nadu, to inaugurate the newly constructed buildingfor the Medical College and the Hospital. On this occasion, the Central Government has also handed overthe existin…
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
ESIC medical college & hospital in Coimbatore will be a boon to ESIC beneficiaries & their family members. 

Elaborated on NDA Govt's social security schemes, reforms of EPFO & ESIC. Also emphasised on improving public service delivery standards.We are continuously working for welfare of India's industrious workforce & are striving towards 'Making India a Better Work Place for All.' http://nm-4.com/0a6e
